Description:
Job Summary:The Accounting Assistant will support the financial activities of the corporation and assist with the preparation of current financial reports and summaries.Responsibilities:Assists the preparation of all financial statements, including income statements, balance sheets, and tax returns.
Compares sales and profit projections to actual figures and budgeted expenses to actual expenses; assists with any necessary adjustments to future projections and budgets.
Reviews planning process and suggests improvements to current methods.
Analyses operations to identify areas in need of reorganisation or elimination.
Support digitisation of processes to improve efficiency and enhance analytical performance.
Works with the Finance Director and other executives to assist with planning and establish priorities for the planning process.Job Details
